item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - HBO Original : The Idol (2023) [MKV | Dolby Vision + HDR10 | E-AC3-JOC 5.1 English]
item.description:
Synopsis:
After a nervous breakdown, Jocelyn is determined to recover his most popular pop star title. Tedros, a nightclub owner and leader of a cult, revives the flame in her. However, this romance is dangerous for Jocelyn.

The.Idol.S01.Warner.DV.HDR.2160p.WEBRip.DDP.5.1.Atmos.H.264-SonMaxime
